snippet: Dressing the athletes who compete in the Winter Olympics is a sport unto itself that provides companies a chance to expose their brands to a global audience.
abstract: Dressing the athletes who compete in the Winter Olympics is a sport unto itself that provides companies a chance to expose their brands to a global audience; companies vie for the right to design and manufacture clothes, both functional and aspirational, then spend months promoting their creations through choreographed unveilings, hoping to outdo their fashion rivals.
lead_paragraph: Dressing the athletes who compete in the Winter Olympics is a sport unto itself that provides companies a chance to expose their brands to a global audience.

headline.main: Designers Carve a Fashion Runway at the Games
headline.print_headline: Competing to Make Boldest Statement at Fashion Games
